meanings.definition: To surpass in cleverness or skill.
meanings.sent1: She always outslicks her classmates in solving puzzles.
meanings.sent2: The detective outslicks the criminals with his quick thinking.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox outslicks the hunter by hiding in the bushes.
meanings.sent4: Her strategy outslicks all others, making her the champion.
meanings.sent5: His wit and intelligence outslicks everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: To outdo in a competition or challenge.
meanings.sent1: He outslicks his opponents in every chess match.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outslicks his personal best in the race.
meanings.sent3: The student outslicks his own record by scoring higher on the test.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outslicks any obstacles in her path to success.
meanings.sent5: The team's unity and coordination outslicks their rivals in the tournament.
